Which 2 statements should be recorded under the Risk tolerance heading?

comments.content: Sorry I have revised my answer as above.

discussion.content: Transfer, Share, reduce, accept, fallback, reduce

Answer 1 - Reduce - This response will help to reduce the probability of the event occurring, but it may not be enough to totally prevent the risk from happening.
Answer 2 - Transfer - This response is transferring some of the financial impact of the threat to the third party supplier.
Answer 3 - Reduce - This response will help to reduce the probability of the event occurring, but it may not be enough to totally prevent the risk from happening.
Answer 4 - Accept - This is based on trust and no action is taken.
According to various sources, such as https://www.prince2primer.com/prince2-risk-response-quiz/ and https://www.prince2primer.com/prince2-risk-response-quiz/ outsourcing is risk transfer (not share)
